definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="current_rad_id">current_rad_id</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">irradiation_damage</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RadioactiveCFG</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="damagesource_is_tagged_in"><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forge:radiation_damage</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">Irradiate</field></block></next></block></statement></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">decontamination_damage</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RadioactiveCFG</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="damagesource_is_tagged_in"><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tag"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">forge:radiation_remove_damage</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="cancel_event"><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">Decontaminate</field></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
